inventory=[{"type": "granite", "quantity": 6, "index": 10}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 43, "index": 14}, {"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 51, "index": 15}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 18, "index": 24}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "chipped_anvil", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "fire_coral_block", "quantity": 11, "index": 39}, {"type": "horn_coral_block", "quantity": 37, "index": 40}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 39, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a granite wall I need to place 6 granite in the crafting grid. I will move 1 from slot 10 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1
